summary: A family in 1630s New England is torn apart by the forces of witchcraft, black magic, and possession.
cast: Anya Taylor-Joy|Ralph Ineson|Kate Dickie|Harvey Scrimshaw|Ellie Grainger|Lucas Dawson|Julian Richings|Bathsheba Garnett|Sarah Stephens|Daniel Malik|Axtun Henry Dube|Athan Conrad Dube|Viv Moore|Karen Kaeja|Brandy Leary|R. Hope Terry|Carrie Eklund|Madlen Sopadzhiyan|Paul Kenworthy|Mark Millman|Andy Volpe|Phillip Wynne|Annawon Weeden|Michael O'Hare|Chris Messier|Ron G. Young|Norah Messier|Bill Rudder|Grace Duffy|Sophie Bermudez|Corrine Manning|Heather Huntington Stewart|Brooklyn Herd|Derek Herd|Jeff Smith
title: La bruja: Una leyenda de Nueva Inglaterra
